Html: Using some examples, I have figured out how to make it so the PART_Pop for a WPF combobox will open a filtered datagrid with some more bells and whistles.  Now, I would like to be able to apply that to a combobox column type in the datagrid.  Not everyone, but specific ones.  I thought about using the templatecolumn type and just use my combobox.   But can you tell me how I can either make a new columntype that would do this or how I can edit the PART_Pop for the comboboxcolumn type.
